channel.title: Beside You - Thomaisho [Glitch Orchestral Electronic]
channel.description:
You know, there probably is a better and more simplified name for the genre, but whatever haha.
This is my first full song using Auxy 6, and I hope you all enjoy it ^^
Thoughts? Comments? https://soundcloud.com/user-161462983/beside-you ![image|598x500](upload://rIY5o5mR2y9wUN2vdzgqzFczWEy.jpeg)
